short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly collect contact information from any webpage or profile.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Navigate to any website or profile and simply click the Leadify icon to collect the name, email, phone number, and social accounts that are available.

Generate AI cold emails on the go.

Export your lead list to a CSV file.
